moveThreateningPosition

public Move moveThreateningPosition(Position position,
                                    boolean affinity,
                                    Piece pieceThatWonders)
This method checks for a move that could reach the given position by the other player in one move

Parameters:
position - the position to check
affinity - the affinity of the threatening player
Returns:
a move if the player with the given affinity could move into position in one move, otherwise null

getMovesThreateningPosition

public java.util.HashMap<Piece,Move> getMovesThreateningPosition(Position position,
                                                                 boolean affinity)
Parameters:
position - the threatened position
affinity - the affinity of the player that should threaten the position
Returns:
a map of pieces and their respective moves that is threatening the given position

isMoveThreateningPositionRightNow

public boolean isMoveThreateningPositionRightNow(Position position,
                                                 boolean affinity)
Parameters:
position - the threatened position
affinity - the affinity of the player that should threaten the position
Returns:
true if the position is threatened
